description: This course is an analytical and computational study of Newtonian mechanics, including the harmonic oscillator, central force motion, non-linear oscillators, chaos, and an introduction to the Lagrangian formulation. Students use computers extensively. Prerequisites: Physics 232 and Mathematics 230. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Classical Mechanics
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Physics 232 and Mathematics 230. Offered annually in the fall semester.
